Meetings at Ponte Vedra Inn & Club
Sophisticated charm meets glowing hospitality at Ponte Vedra Inn & Club. For business meetings and events, the Inn & Club offers a rich history, a sparkling seaside setting, and a sterling reputation. Trust your meeting in the capable hands of our expert team and enjoy exceptional attention to every detail. Our Conference Center is beautifully designed for comfort and functionality and our banquet halls are truly second-to-none. Time honored and steeped in 90 years of tradition, the historic Inn & Club successfully combines award-winning accommodations, world-class amenities, and endless activities in a warm and friendly atmosphere.
Browse our venues and discover the perfect space to bring your meeting vision to life.

Events at The Lodge & Club Ponte Vedra Beach
Since 1989, The Lodge & Club Ponte Vedra Beach has sparkled as one of Florida’s most elegant oceanfront resorts. Mediterranean flair, rolling dunes, and graceful palms give the resort a distinct character you won’t find anywhere else along the Atlantic coast.
Social events are made even more special when you host at the intimate, incredible The Lodge & Club. Gather friends, family, and loved ones to celebrate, entertain, or mark a meaningful moment surrounded by stunning sea views and refined touches that elevate any occasion. Plus, our expert event team will make planning simple and stress free.
Browse our venues and discover the perfect space to bring your event vision to life.

Social Events at The Lodge & Club
Whatever your reason to celebrate, The Lodge & Club will welcome you with genuine Southern hospitality and attentive service that addresses and anticipates all of your event needs. For families, weddings, alumni gatherings and more, our team is ready to handle anything you need. Plus, you’ll enjoy reciprocal access to golf, tennis, spa and more at our sister resort, Ponte Vedra Inn & Club.
Request a Proposal
Family Reunions
Celebrate the gift of family surrounded by luxury and stunning ocean views. Our wide array of resort amenities offers something for all ages.
Alumni Gatherings
Reconnect with classmates and toast to cherished memories. Savor an incredible meal, challenge each other on the course or court, or treat yourselves to refreshing spa experiences.
Bar/Bat Mitzvahs
Celebrate the young man or lady in your family with a mitzvah party overlooking the ocean.
Catering at The Lodge & Club
For every taste and time of day, our catering team is on hand to serve up snacks, meals, and refreshments your guests are sure to savor. Start the day with a fresh continental breakfast or more hearty fare, and choose from lunch and dinner menus that feature fresh, seasonal ingredients and flavors that range from local to global.

Our Professional Golf Staff
Meet our Team on the Greens
Our team of golf professionals have played with and worked with some of the best in the game—and have earned awards and accolades in their own right. From beginners young and old to seasoned players, our team will work with you to provide insight and education to refine and improve your game.
Jeff Hanson, PGA - Director of Golf
A skilled player who was Captain of his collegiate golf team at the University of Wyoming, Jeff began his career as Head Professional at Glenmoor Country Club before becoming Assistant Professional at Cherry Hills Country Club, one of the country’s top-ranked clubs. He then was Head Professional at Beaver Creek Country Club before becoming Director of Golf at Red Sky Golf Club at the club’s inception in 2001. Since then he has been instrumental in all aspects of the club’s golf operations.
Jeff possesses a great passion for the game of golf and is a tremendous addition to the Ponte Vedra Inn & Club team. He brings a wealth of experience from some of the most renowned clubs in the United States and is committed to enhancing the member golf experience while embracing our long-standing history and traditions.
Joey Flinchbaugh - Director Agronomy
Joey is a native of Ponte Vedra Beach, FL.  After graduating from Nease High School, Joey attended Lake City Community College focusing on Golf Course Operations. While in college, Joey began gaining agronomic experience at TPC Sawgrass during the school year. During the summers, Joey expanded his experience by completing internships at the most prestigious clubs in the country including Charlotte Country Club and Merion Golf Club.  When an opportunity at TPC Sawgrass became available, Joey returned home to become an assistant.  While the tournament experience was an attraction, TPC provided year-round learning.  Along with hosting The PLAYERS Championship, TPC Sawgrass Stadium Course underwent construction every year.  TPC Sawgrass was also an opportunity to develop management skills with an extremely fast paced, multi-faceted environment.
Having honed his at TPC Sawgrass, he once again turned to the private club sector as the Senior Assistant Superintendent at Pablo Creek. Pablo Creek provided time to perfect his agronomic knowledge. Here he learned procedures, which he implements today.  Joey’s experiences at a vast array of clubs groomed him for the opportunity at Ponte Vedra Inn and Club
Gina Bamberger, PGA - Director of Sports Retail
Gina joins us from Maketewah Country Club in Cincinnati, Ohio, where she excelled as the Retail Manager. She holds a Bachelor's degree in Recreation and Tourism Management from San Diego State University and was an accomplished member of the golf team for four years, qualifying for three US Mid-Amateur Championships. Gina is actively involved in the Association of Golf Merchandisers and is on her way to becoming a PGA of America member. Additionally, she is licensed in real estate and is a Certified Rescue Diver. Gina is married to Alex, and they have a son named Nicholas.
Josh Wolfe, PGA – Head Golf Professional
Josh Wolfe joins Ponte Vedra Inn & Club from San Jose Country Club, where he has served as Head Professional since 2020. His career includes Assistant Professional roles at Arnold Palmer’s Bay Hill Club and ChampionsGate Golf Club, both in Orlando. Josh brings exceptional enthusiasm and expertise to all aspects of golf operations, with a strong focus on tournament management and staff development.
Maxine Skeens – Golf Shop Manager
Maxine Skeens, born and raised in LaPlata, Maryland, has always been driven by her passion for sports, which has profoundly influenced both her personal and professional life. This enthusiasm led her to Coastal Carolina University, where she earned a Bachelor's degree in Recreation and Sport Management in May 2022. Maxine’s entry into the golf industry began during her undergraduate years, gaining invaluable experience at Hackler Golf Course near Myrtle Beach, South Carolina.
Following her graduation, Maxine moved to Jacksonville, Florida, where she joined the prestigious Ponte Vedra Inn & Club as the Golf Event Coordinator. Her dedication to organizing unique events and fostering a well-structured environment quickly earned her a promotion to Golf Shop Manager. Maxine continues to bring her expertise and passion for golf to her role, ensuring exceptional service and memorable experiences for all members and guests.
Jonathan Williams, PGA - Assistant Golf Professional
Born and raised in Cincinnati, Ohio, Jonathan has distinguished himself in the golfing profession, primarily in North East Florida. A former member of Hanover College's golf team, he was elected to the PGA of America in 2010, and subsequently achieved certifications in Golf Operations in 2016 and General Management in 2019. Jonathan's zeal for the sport is evident in both his competitive play and his dedication to teaching and coaching, which he further enriches through enrollment in the Titleist Performance Institute (TPI) program. In 2013, he moved to Ponte Vedra Beach to serve as an Assistant Golf Professional at TPC Sawgrass, the Home of THE PLAYERS, before advancing to the role of Head Golf Professional at King and Bear. Since 2021, Jonathan has been a valued member of the Ponte Vedra Inn & Club Professional Staff. Alongside his professional pursuits, he enjoys beach outings and golfing with his wife and their two young boys.

Friday, August 29
Music City Live | Nashville Songwriters Experience
6:30 PM | $135 | The Croquet Lawn
Music City Live is a live music experience that features three of the top singer-songwriters (Adam Craig, Lauren Hungate, Matt Roger) from Nashville, TN. These talented entertainers write songs for and with some of the biggest names in the music industry. Listen to talent and storytelling under the stars. A Nashville Hot Chicken station and Cuban coffee is included in this event. There will be an additional charge bar.  Inclement weather this event will move indoors.
Adults (21+)
Seating will be intimate and on a first come first served basis.

Ponte Vedra Inn & Club Membership
Ponte Vedra Inn & Club, a AAA Five-Diamond oceanfront resort, is also Florida’s most prestigious private country club. It began in 1928 as a rustic log cabin clubhouse with a nine-hole golf course and has evolved into northeast Florida’s most exclusive, amenity-rich country club with world-renown golf courses. Membership at Ponte Vedra Inn & Club
bestows a more beautiful life
.

The Lodge & Club Ponte Vedra Beach Membership
Nestled atop a gentle cascade of dunes overlooking the azure waters of the Atlantic Ocean rests one of Florida’s premier private membership clubs—The Lodge & Club. Meetings at The Lodge & Club Ponte Vedra Beach
Located directly on the Atlantic Ocean, midway between Jacksonville and St. Augustine, our sophisticated, Mediterranean-styled resort has been the meeting site of choice for many top Fortune 100 companies. When it comes to your small to mid-sized group, you can choose from seven versatile locations offering more than 13,000 square feet of meeting space surrounded by captivating ocean views. Plus, our dedicated team will offer a level of service that truly goes the extra mile.
The resort’s distinctive character is echoed throughout its ten seaside acres. A beachside fountain courtyard, wrought iron lamp posts, classic archways, Spanish tile roof, and ornamental architectural touches all combine to create an inspiring atmosphere.
Browse our venues and discover the perfect space to bring your meeting vision to life.

Venues at Ponte Vedra Inn & Club
Over the last 90 years, we’ve hosted countless social events at Ponte Vedra Inn & Club, so you know you’ll be in good hands with our expert team when it comes to planning your celebration.
Our historic resort gives any event a sense of effortless luxury and timeless grandeur. With 262 rooms and suites, there is space for everyone, and with a beachside pool, championship golf and tennis, a world-class spa and more, everything you need is right here.
Browse our venues and discover the perfect space to bring your event vision to life.

Social Events at Inn & Club
Create meaningful moments when you host your next social event at Inn & Club. Perfect for families, weddings, alumni gatherings and more, your guests will enjoy warm Southern hospitality and sun-filled days at our luxurious oceanside escape. With delicious dining options, a world-class spa, golf, and tennis experiences and more, everything you need just steps away.
Request a Proposal
Family Reunions
Celebrate the gift of family surrounded by luxury and stunning ocean views. Our wide array of resort amenities offers something for all ages.
Alumni Gatherings
Reconnect with classmates and toast to cherished memories. Savor an incredible meal, challenge each other on the course or court, or treat yourselves to refreshing spa experiences.
Bar/Bat Mitzvahs
Celebrate the young man or lady in your family with a mitzvah party overlooking the ocean.
Catering at Inn & Club
For every taste and time of day, our catering team is on hand to serve up snacks, meals, and refreshments your guests are sure to savor. Start the day with a fresh continental breakfast or more hearty fare, and choose from lunch and dinner menus that feature fresh, seasonal ingredients and flavors that range from local to global.

About Us
We can’t wait to welcome you to Ponte Vedra Inn & Club and The Lodge & Club Ponte Vedra Beach. Each resort has its own charm and allure, yet both offer a complete resort experience that sets the standard in Northeast Florida.
Read on to discover more about our storied past, our membership and all the exclusive benefits it offers, useful directions, and information on making your home here in Ponte Vedra Beach.
Our History
We started from humble beginnings as a mining town and now, we are a nationally recognized seaside community. Ponte Vedra Inn & Club opened in 1928 as a glamorous seaside retreat, and has welcomed generations of families to our slice of beachside paradise. The Lodge & Club opened in 1989 as an intimate, romantic escape with access to all its sister resort offers. Both resorts have a story to tell. Learn more here.
Learn More
Become a Member
Being a member of Ponte Vedra Inn & Club or The Lodge & Club is like being part of our family. Not only will you enjoy world-class amenities, activities and ocean views, you will also receive discounts on accommodations, dining, and more.
Learn More
